the nice guys is directed by Shane Black and stars Russell Crowe Ryan Gosling Angourie Rice Matt Bomer Margaret Qualley Keith David and Kim Basinger This is an action comedy film in which a mismatched pair of detectives investigate a missing girl and the death of a porn actress with some help from related people even her missing girl s mother. Russell Crowe and Ryan Gos l in g's characters are totally different from what they usually are and used to be in their other films Russell Crowe plays a kind of brutal and a little bit short tempered man who usually smashes annoying people no mater where they are He is not like that guy in Beautiful Mind or Noa h. We can see totally different Russell Crowe in that film. So is Ryan Gosling who plays a looking smart detective but actually is prone to getting tipsy even during their investigations Ryan Gosling is usually a cool or inscrutable person who doesn't really react whatever happens to him Whereas in this film he is kinda a comical and hilarious guy who is likely to screw up tasks I m looking forward to La la land by the way .) I can definitely say that his character in La la land isn t like in Nice Guys lol Anyway Enjoy this film..

I've seen people talk about how good the 80 s were As a 90 s kid all that is nothing but a mystery. But here we have Mr Shane Black telling a buddy cop story in that time frame that makes me want to go back to those days. With so many blockbusters obsessed with CG and big b old action it s nice to see an action comedy that embraces it s gleefulness. Russell Crowe and Ryan Gosling work well together and surprisingly funny. The tracking shots were amazing the writing was witty and spot on. Definitely check this out when it comes to theaters.

The Nice Guys is a noir with series of unfortunate events that relentlessly befall upon the ex ceptional two lead s Crowe and Gosling In reminiscence to Shane Black s rather underrated Kiss Kiss Bang Bang The Nice Guys excels at present ing slick humor full of clever cynicism while sustaining witty dialogues charmingly stylized visual intriguing mystery and surprisingly well crafted action bits The movie is undoubtedly one of 2016 s most entertaining outing thus far.

Disappointed with t his one 91% on Rotten Tomatoes don t think so. Everybody is talking about the c hemistry between Russell Crowe and Ryan Gosling but I didn t see it. Ryan was good probably the only good thing in this movie but I did not like Russell I don t know whether it was him or the way his character was written but I found him annoying and oh boy is he getting FAT. I also found The Nice Guys somewhat jarring silly and overly serious chilled and overly violent at the same time. And my last issue is that I didn t find if funny all the funny bits were in the trailer. I m giving it 3 stars but I feel I m being generous.
